definition: Xuanzang (602-664) Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator, who traveled to India 629-645
Tang dynasty (618-907)/surname Tang
to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
monk/Sangha, the Buddhist monastic order

sentences.english: The monk again severe, but is also a monkey.
sentences.chinese: 唐僧再厲害，也不過是個耍猴的。

sentences.english: At night they stayed in a temple. The evil spirit took Tang Priest to her Bottomless Cave using an evil wind.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，耗子精用妖風把唐僧擒到住處無底洞。

sentences.english: The Tang Dynasty the monk misunderstands Sun Wu empty excessive to kill however innocent, chase its a division door.

sentences.english: Then, Tang Monk and his three disciples set out without any delay.
sentences.chinese: 唐僧也率衆徒立即啓程西行，不敢耽擱。

sentences.english: Be turn for the Tang Dynasty monk, does Budda ask what desire he has?
sentences.chinese: 輪到唐僧了，佛祖問他有什麼願望？

sentences.english: The Tang Priest heard the boy's cries and asked Monkey to release him.
sentences.chinese: 唐僧聽到喊聲，讓悟空去解救。

sentences.english: Yes, see how we will seize tang monk back.
sentences.chinese: 看我們怎樣把唐僧抓回來。

sentences.english: This mantra, Sun Wukong never dare not listen to his words.
sentences.chinese: 咒，從此孫悟空再也不敢不聽唐僧的話了。

sentences.english: The character, Tang Seng, is different from the real-life monk Xuanzang.
sentences.chinese: 《西遊記》裏的唐僧和真實的玄奘還是有區別的。

sentences.english: Tang Seng has been a crime, fell ran.

sentences.english: So it is also called Tangseng Ancient Road.
sentences.chinese: 所以這條路又被稱作唐僧古道。

sentences.english: Some time ago, Red Boy had tried to eat the Tang Priest and Monkey had subdued him.
sentences.chinese: 前一段時間，紅孩兒吃了唐僧和孫悟空制服了他。

sentences.english: The story of Bonze Tangs "river current" life experience is a complex literature phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 唐僧“江流兒”身世的故事是一個複雜的文學現象。

sentences.chinese: 就在這時，女郎化身成一陣旋風，把唐僧捲進了洞裏。
